# UI Accessibility Audit (ACB Link Desktop)

You are auditing UI changes for accessibility risks.

## Checklist
- All interactive controls have accessible names and tooltips.
- Keyboard navigation order is logical and complete.
- Focus is visible and not obscured.
- Status updates are announced via `announce()` or `LiveRegion`.
- Color contrast meets WCAG 2.2 AA.
- No keyboard traps.

## Output
- Findings with file/line references
- Required fixes and suggested tests
